title: Does anyone else think the new Quinn skin is really hot

replies.body: I don't know. I need a map and a microscope to find Quinn on the splash.
so you're saying she's making your roger jolly? :3 {{champion:41}}
Rest in piece joke, you will be missed when GP gets updated.

Nope.  You're not the only one.

Then again, I have the hots for Shyvana and Kayle.  So, there's that...

<_<

What?
Shyvana's thighs. Gotta love them.
bro {{champion:134}} thighs are best thighs
{{champion:43}}  :(
What's this champion?
definitely not blitzcrank..
WRONG {{champion:69}} thighs are the best
Naw man its not just the thighs, its tha thigh gap. And shyv has a thigh gap like wow.
Honest question time: Am I the only guy who does *not* like a thigh gap? O.o
Not the only, but part of a rare breed.
I dunno, there's just something about a bit fuller figure that gets me. ;)

Anyone Karen Strassman voices is awesome.  Shyvana, Fiora, Zyra, Elise...  >_<  Don't look at me like that!  There's something about nonhuman women whispering in my ear that is very relaxing.

It's like a petite and not crazy version of {{champion:254}} .
and she is blonde >:D.  She is a cutie but nowhere near the studliness of {{champion:201}}
I'm really starting to wonder why every female skin, when put onto the thumbnail for a Boards post, seems to be entirely focused on their boobs...
I love this being a totally different side of Quinn. She's kind of shown as a moderately attractive tough kick-your-butt-with-a-bird person, and this skin is like lmao whatup (;
Well compared to her other splash arts, Yeah its 11/10.
I think that new MF skin is smoking.  Leaves me in shock in awe ;D
The new MF skin is smoking. But graves still can't have his cigar.

Pirates are hot.

Redheads are hot.

Blondes are hot.

Tough chicks are hot.

Quinn is literally all of the above. I'm not sure if that makes her Quadra Hot, or just Hot. But she is one of those things I just said.
It's the boobjob.
Would boink.
Quinn is a really nice champ and deserves a nice skin.
Since when was Quinn a nice champ?

Please. you seen the tummy on Woad Scout {{champion:133}} .

don't tell me you wouldn't raspberry that.

Have you seen Captain Miss Fortune?

 http://media-titanium.cursecdn.com/loldiffs/AirClientDiff_7_8_2015_8_07_PM/media/MissFortune_Splash_8.jpg

agreed, one new animation and model shouldn't constitue a instant 275 RP increase
Unsure if sarcastic or just doesn't understand the work that goes into 3d modelling.

> [{quoted}](name=Delioth,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cj9w9jEw,comment-id=001c000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-12T19:16:39.717+0000)
>
> Unsure if sarcastic or just doesn't understand the work that goes into 3d modelling.

actually i do... i am a senior in college for game art and animation... and idk if this was dierected at me (came up under my inbox here) but models can be in works for 3-4 weeks, of course this is after concept art and the lead artist gives you the go. 

Second pass if the model needs any fixes in topology, N-gons (faces with 4+ faces or tris with 3 faces) messes with topology later. 
few weeks

Texturing is next
week or two

Then Rigging.
3-4 weeks depending on how complex the model is

Then animating.
One animation can be done in a week but give 2 for spit and shine.

Than compiling in code in engine.
2 to 3 weeks maybe. Not quite sure here, grazed over character compiling in engine.

Debugging.
As long as it takes

Released

VERY BASIC order for a champion or any character to be released in a game.
dat {{champion:60}} lower abdomen doe.

and in this skin she looks like her sister, so ofc I love it
